ref: Ɔvale ɛnelɛ kpole ɔbuale kpuya nwiɔ mɔɔ tendɛvolɛ ne bizale la .

text: Regarding human history since then , God 's Word summarizes it this way : " Man has dominated man to his harm . "
ref: Ɔvi zɔhane mekɛ ne , Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne pɛ alesama tetedwɛkɛ ne sikalɛ kɛ : " Bie mɔ lɛ tumi ɛlɛsisi bie mɔ bɛamaa bɛanwu amaneɛ . "

text: There is no middle ground . - Matt .
ref: Ɔwɔ kɛ yɛ kɔsɔɔti yɛkpa ɛleka mɔɔ yɛbagyinla la . - Mat .

text: During the " great tribulation , " we will need to remain closely associated with our local congregation ( See paragraphs 16 - 18 )
ref: Ɔwɔ kɛ yɛbeta yɛ asafo ne anwo wɔ " anwongyelelɛ " kpole ne anu ( Nea ɛdendɛkpunli 16 - 18 )

text: We need to make close friends in the congregation and encourage one another , especially during difficult times .
ref: Ɔwɔ kɛ yɛfa asafo ne anu amra agɔnwolɛ kpalɛ na yɛmaa yɛ nwo anwosesebɛ , titili wɔ ngyegyelɛ mekɛ nu .

text: Therefore , it is vital to set our minds on the things of the spirit .
ref: Ɔwɔ kɛ yɛfa yɛ adwenle yɛsie Nyamenle anwo ninyɛne zo .

text: We must not hold back the love that Jehovah commands us to display ! - 1 John 4 : 20 , 21 .
ref: Ɔwɔ kɛ yɛkulo yɛ mediema kɛ mɔɔ Gyihova se yɛyɛ ye la ! - 1 Dwɔn 4 : 20 , 21 .

text: He must be prepared to give up even what is dear to him if it would put him in danger of falling into sin .
ref: Ɔwɔ kɛ ɔsiezie ɔ nwo kɛ ɔbagyakyi debie mɔɔ ɔ nye die nwo mɔɔ ɔbamaa yeayɛ ɛtane la .
